Do you have any other questions about the diet or any other foods you're wondering about?

Patient: Right. I get it. I'm not supposed to have fruit really because it has fiber.

Nurse: Yes, that's correct. During this preparation period, it's best to avoid high-fiber foods like fruits. However, this is a rare time when doctors want their patients to be eating low fiber comfort foods. So, enjoy your yogurt as it is. Do you have any other questions about the diet or any other foods you're wondering about?

Patient: Nope.

Nurse: Alright. Let's move on to the topic of supplements. You will need to stop any supplements you take like Psyllium husk or any anti-diarrheal medications. Are you currently taking any supplements or anti-diarrheal medications?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's good to hear. It's important to avoid those supplements and medications before a colonoscopy. Do you have any questions about this or is there anything else you'd like to discuss?

Patient: Thank you.
